#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

<img src="../logo.gif" /><a class="menu" href="../index.html">[Index]</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a class="menu" href="index.html">[Function index]</a><h1> Get all parking spots</h1><p>Provides a list of car2go parking spots for a specific location like ulm or austin in KML format.
              <p>
              KML is a file format used to display geographic data in an Earth browser such as Google Earth, Google Maps, and Google Maps
              for mobile. More information about KML can be found here: 
              <a href="http://code.google.com/intl/de/apis/kml/documentation/kmlreference.html" target="_blank">KML Reference at
              code.google.com</a>
              </p>
              <p>
              The parking spots are especially dedicated for car2go vehicles.
              </p></p><table class="funcdetail"><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">Access:</td><td>public</td></tr><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">URL:</td><td>http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/parkingspots</td></tr><tr><td class="funcdetailheader">Method:</td><td>GET</td></tr></table><h3>Parameters</h3><table class="parameters"><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Mandatory</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>loc</td><td>true</td><td> location identifier string of the location the parking spots are searched for, e.g. "ulm", "austin".</td></tr><tr><td>format</td><td>false</td><td> defines response format. Value "json" => JSON format, otherwise xml format is used</td></tr></tbody></table><h3>Request Examples</h3><div class="sample"><pre>GET http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/parkingspots?loc=Ulm</pre></div><div class="sample"><pre>GET http://www.car2go.com/api/v2.0/parkingspots?loc=Austin&format=json</pre></div><h3>Response</h3>The KML file defines a placemark tag for each car2go parking spot. The placemark tag defines following sub tags:
                  <ul>
                  <li>name - The name of the parking spot</li>
                  <li>description - contains the total and used capacity of the parking spot</li>
                  <li>point - the coordinates of the parking spot</li>
                  <li>extendeddata - contains the usedCapacity and the totalCapacity of the parking spot as separate attributes</li>
                  </ul><h3>Response Examples</h3><div class="sample">A KML response example:
 <pre>
 &lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot; standalone=&quot;yes&quot;?&gt;
 &lt;kml xmlns:ns3=&quot;urn:oasis:names:tc:ciq:xsdschema:xAL:2.0&quot; xmlns:ns2=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom&quot;
 	xmlns=&quot;http://www.opengis.net/kml/2.2&quot;&gt;
 	&lt;Document&gt;
 		&lt;description&gt;CAR2GO Parking Lots&lt;/description&gt;
 		&lt;Style id=&quot;car2go&quot;&gt;
 			&lt;IconStyle&gt;
 				&lt;Icon&gt;
 					&lt;href&gt;http://www.car2go.com/default/img/backgrounds/Marker_Parking.png
 					&lt;/href&gt;
 				&lt;/Icon&gt;
 				&lt;hotSpot y=&quot;0.0&quot; x=&quot;0.0&quot; /&gt;
 			&lt;/IconStyle&gt;
 		&lt;/Style&gt;
 		&lt;Style id=&quot;car2go_excluded&quot;&gt;
 			&lt;LineStyle&gt;
 				&lt;color&gt;FF0000FF&lt;/color&gt;
 			&lt;/LineStyle&gt;
 		&lt;/Style&gt;
 		&lt;Style id=&quot;car2go_included&quot;&gt;
 			&lt;LineStyle&gt;
 				&lt;color&gt;FF00FF00&lt;/color&gt;
 			&lt;/LineStyle&gt;
 		&lt;/Style&gt;
 		&lt;Placemark&gt;
 			&lt;name&gt;Inner City Parkspot 2&lt;/name&gt;
 			&lt;description&gt;Capacity (used/total): 0/3&lt;/description&gt;
 			&lt;styleUrl&gt;#car2go&lt;/styleUrl&gt;
 			&lt;ExtendedData&gt;
 				&lt;Data name=&quot;usedCapacity&quot;&gt;&lt;value&gt;0&lt;/value&gt;&lt;/Data&gt;
 				&lt;Data name=&quot;totalCapacity&quot;&gt;&lt;value&gt;3&lt;/value&gt;&lt;/Data&gt;
 			&lt;/ExtendedData&gt;
 			&lt;Point&gt;
 				&lt;coordinates&gt;9.983611,48.398565,0&lt;/coordinates&gt;
 			&lt;/Point&gt;
 		&lt;/Placemark&gt;
 	&lt;/Document&gt;
 &lt;/kml&gt;
</pre></div><div class="sample">A JSON response example:
